capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall and it's amazing to think that she's an adult now. I mean, can you believe it? She's still teaching Transfiguration at Hogwarts despite being over 50 years old. It's really inspiring to see someone so dedicated to their craft, even after all these years.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never met an adult before, this is really interesting!
